title: 588. No Such Thing As A Punk Monk
content:
Live from the Nerdland Festival in Belgium, Dan, James, Anna, and Andy discuss swords, sheep, Samurai and scientific studies.

Visit nosuchthingasafish.com for news about live shows, merchandise and more episodes.
